snippet.title: Man dead, woman injured in Sunshine West
snippet.content: A man has died and a woman has been injured at a home in Melbourne's west on Saturday night. Homicide Squad detectives are investigating the death of a man at a house in McGregor Court, Sunshine West, just after 8.30pm. Police say a woman was found at the scene with non-life threatening injuries, with the exact circumstances surrounding the incident yet to be determined. Anyone with information should call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
